text: Andrei Maratovich Babitsky (; 26 September 1964 – 1 April 2022) was a Russian journalist and war reporter. He worked for Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty (RFE/RL) from 1989 to 2014. He reported the 1991 August Coup, Civil War in Tajikistan and both the First and Second Chechen Wars. ==Other websites== * Brief Legal Evaluation of Circumstances Attending to Andrei Babitsky’s Detention, Glastnost Defense Foundation * Babitsky's "crime" and punishment CPJ Press Freedom Online * Babitsky's War, television documentary * Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Moscow Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Russian journalists Category:War correspondents
title: Andrei Babitsky
